name: Production/Design
description:
***SELECT YOUR OPTION****

***** PRICE IS DEFAULTED TO AN EP PRICE****


TW Productions is a freelancing production company that does mixing, producing, remixing, or recording songs/albums from any band or artists regardless of genre. As well as album artwork/logos.

Song: $15.00-Mixing

Instrumentals From Scratch: $20.00

Album: $50.00-Produce (more than 5 songs) 

EP: $20.00-Produce (Less than 5)

artwork: $15.00

Signing To The Company- To be signed you must have a record/EP done by our company. This IS NOT a label. Only thing we can do is produce and promote, BUT a picture of the artwork must be send to have our logo put onto it! EVERY ARTISTS KEEPS 100% OF SALES OF ALBUM/SONGS UNLESS YOU OWE MONEY!
